Comments_List: Atmospheric and organic chemistry, physics and operational knowledge of major air pollution sources from energy related processes.

Great class! Would have been stronger if you spent more time on the causes of the pollution, and less on the actual chemical processes of what is going on at the molecular level which became a bit bogged down.
Absolutely! This is a teriffic class to add to your list!
